Why the company didn't assign a senior people to lead whole group? Wasn't anyone available? If so, then how can we know that your internship provided good mentoring, if senior people are not assigned to lead projects, but fellow interns are? Was this whole internship a waste of time, where you just go to office and do whatever you want?

Italicization, ALL-CAPS, and bolding, if used, should be used independently of each other.
If you've been out of school for a while, your section order should be: Skills > Experience > Projects > Education
If you're a student or new grad, your section order should be: Education > Experience > Projects > Skills
Section headings should be mixed-case, not all-caps i.e. Skills, not .
Don't include coursework unless they are  such as graduate electives or like underwater robotics
Bullet points should be 2 lines or less. Aim for 1 line.
Don't end bullet points with periods. Bullet points != sentences
1 sentence per bullet
Don't spill bullets onto the following line with only 1‚Äì5 words on it. It's an extreme waste of space. For example
